item.title: [ALLSTAR] Need some help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnerofppl Pwnerofppl
item.description:
@Pwnerofppl wrote:

Alright well I’ve looked all over the interwebs and cannot find a tutorial on certain quest tab things…
Like I have
if (q1stage == 0) {
sendQuest("@gre@PLAYERS", 7332);
in the quest tab, and I want to make it so if I clicked PLAYERS it would send a message to my chat box saying basically “There are currently " (show amount of players) " online!” I’ve tried just making it say "Players on: " etc but it doesn’t update, either way I’d like to have it where A. you click it and it says in chat box how many players on… or B. it says players on: and updates with the amount of players. Thanks in advance and sorry if this is basic, I’m learning code still.
EDITI also want to say the reason I’m asking for the tut is because, I don’t know where to add it… (like clicking on it makes it do one of the above listed)EDIT

Read full topic
